<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Hugging Face API Demo</title>
    <!-- Add Gradio CSS -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/gradio/dist/css/gradio.min.css">
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Container for the Gradio interface -->
    <div id="gradio"></div>

    <!-- Add Gradio JS -->
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/gradio/dist/js/gradio.min.js"></script>

    <script>
        // Define the function to create the Gradio interface
        function createGradio() {
            // Define the Hugging Face API endpoint
            const apiEndpoint = "https://huggingface.co/spaces/balkanfirefly/pet_classifier_test";

            // Create the Gradio interface
            const interface = gr.Interface.api(apiEndpoint, 'text', 'text', {
                examples: [["Translate English to French", "Translate this English text to French."]],
                description: "Translate text using Hugging Face models"
            });

            // Display the interface in the specified container
            interface.render(document.getElementById("gradio"));
        }

        // Call the function to create the Gradio interface when the page loads
        window.onload = createGradio;
    </script>
</body>
</html>
